favourite.article: Amen, we need to make ourselves ready for the Lord's return!

Amen, Godâ€™s economy in the New Testament is to obtain for Christ a bride, the church, through His redemption and divine life. By the continual working of the Holy Spirit through all the centuries, this goal will be attained at the end of this age. Then the bride, the overcoming believers, will be ready, and the kingdom of God will come. Rev. 19:7 Footnotes
